title: Top 10 causes of infant mortality in Canada in 2018
summary: This bar chart has 12 categories for the x axis representing Cause, and a y axis representing Number of deaths.
The highest category is found at Congenital_malformations_deformations_and_chromosomal_abnormalities where Number of deaths is 412.0.
The lowest category is found at Sudden_infant_death_syndrome where Number of deaths is 10.0.

data.Cause: Congenital malformations deformations and chromosomal abnormalities
Disorders related to short gestation and low birth weight not elsewhere classified
Newborn affected by maternal complications of pregnancy
Newborn affected by complications of placenta cord and membranes
